question: Who among the following established the "Nari Karma Mandir"?
explanation: Urmila Devi was sister of Chitranjandas. She actively participated in Indian Freedom Struggle. She is best known for establishing the “Nari Karma Mandir” along with Sunita Devi and Basanti Devi (Wife of Chittaranjan Das) to impart trauning to women freedom fighters.
